ships.name: Nistrim-Culluh
ships.text: When attacking a ship at Range 3, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die for every friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship (max +2).

captains.name: Culluh
captains.text: When defending, roll +1 defense die for every [tech] Upgrade deployed to your ship (max +2).

upgrades.name: Ambition
upgrades.text:
When attacking a ship that has more Upgrades assigned to it, you may discard this card to either gain +2 attack dice during the Roll Attack Dice step, or re-roll any number of your attack dice during the Modify Attack Dice step.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Kazon Captain assigned to a Kazon ship.

upgrades.name: Rulat
upgrades.text: When attacking or defending, you may discard this card to re-roll any number of your dice.

upgrades.name: Stolen Technology
upgrades.text:
ACTION: Discard this card to perform the Action listed on a non-Borg [tech] Upgrade deployed to an opposing ship within Range 1-3 of your ship.


This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Kazon ship.
